title: Privacy Policy for Amen24
intro: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data.

collection.title: How We Collect Information
collection.registration: Through registration forms when you create an account.
collection.thirdPartyLogin: When logging in with Google or Facebook.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.analytics: We use Google Analytics to analyze website traffic.
thirdParty.ads: We use Google AdSense to display advertisements.

userRights.title: User Rights & Account Management
userRights.edit: Edit or delete your personal data.

dataDeletionInstructions.title: Data Deletion Instructions
dataDeletionInstructions.description: You can delete your account and all associated data by visiting https://amen24.org/settings and clicking 'Delete Account Permanently'. Alternatively, you can request account deletion by contacting us at support@amen24.org. All data associated with your account will be deleted within 7 working days.

compliance.title: Legal Compliance
compliance.description: We comply with Egyptian data protection laws.
